meanings.definition: Albacores: a large predatory tuna with long pectoral fins.
meanings.sent1: The albacores swam swiftly through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We caught some albacores for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The albacores decided to have a race with the dolphins.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as fierce as a school of albacores.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the albacores glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Albacores: the flesh of this fish used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using albacores.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the taste of albacores in sushi.
meanings.sent3: The albacores were so tasty that even the seagulls wanted a bite.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cooking albacores filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The albacores melted in my mouth, leaving a savory flavor behind.
